Claim: Howard Browman has published a review of papers on ocean acidification.
Implication: The methodology used by the studies was often flawed.
Referring expressions: Howard Browman, ocean acidification, papers.  The studies, methodology, flawed.
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsPublished(a) and (IsAboutOceanAcidification(b) and IsACollectionOf(c)))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsFlawed(e) and (IsMethodology(d) and IsFlawed(e)))))
